text: I feel like I have been  reborn  as of lateI don t have long term depression but I have very unstable mood  One night a month ago I wasn t able to take it and I made a school shooting threat on Snapchat and I said on the same threat that it s fake but they ll have no choice but to throw me in jail just in case or something  Next day   cops show up at school  talk to me for a while and take me home  I go to the hospital with my mom who was crying when I come home and in the hospital they wondered where to put me  Now I m regurarly talking to my school s therapist and were working on finding things for me to care about  I described my situation in a way where Im not scared  depressed or anxious about anything but I also don t have any reason in particular to stay alive and put the effort into doing anything   Before the whole threat situation like   months ago I ve been really getting into philosophy and really thinking about death  My conclusion is that we ve all been there before  Your existence   years in the future is the same situation as your existence   years ago  I know that once I die I ll not have the ability to feel happiness ever again but you also can t feel regret or sadness  I m not afraid of death anymore and it makes me feel like I m kinda free  Fuck being what other people want me to be in the past I ve been described as being very stubborn about my decisions and I m now taking it even further  I m going to do whatever I want and I know I have the know how on getting by  I ll get decent grades and take a job I enjoy instead of something that pays a lot and completely forget about anything but doing the things that please me  We will all be equal in death and I couldn t care less about this really short time I have to spend when it comes to responsibilities  Of course I follow the law but from now on it s  me time

text: I am aloneI have strong feelings to commit suicide at night  Every night  I go through the same routine  clean my room  shower  then stand in my room  deciding if I should either off myself or get in bed  And most of the time i get in bed  Lots of times i end up going to a bridge or building rooftop far away from my apartment  To kill myself  But i end up back home  I think if i leave tonight i will not come back  I feel different  I have no friends or family to talk to  I work  then come home and sleep until my next shift  I never check my phone anymore because no one ever talks to me  I just get spam notifications from apps i dont even use anymore  The person i loved the most killed themselves   months ago almost  I have nothing to live for  I failed four semesters in college and am getting academically expelled due to failing grades  I lost one of my jobs and my current job makes me less money than my bills  One of my checking accounts was negative for so many months it got shut down  The only one i have open is also negative hundreds  and will be shut down soon as well  I have nothing  I can t even talk to a friend that loves me  Or family that loves me  There is no one  Closest family is hundreds of miles away and they hate me  My whole family cut me off  I m such a piece of shit  I cry myself to puking every night and go days without eating  Who needs me  No one  Goodbye
summary: I want to kill myself every night but I have no one to talk to. The person I loved the most killed themselves months ago. I failed four semesters in college and am getting academically expelled due to failing grades. I lost one of my jobs and my current job makes less money than my bills. My family cut me off. I can't even talk to a friend that loves me.

text: UPDATE  Today is my BirthdayI posted about   weeks ago on my birthday and got so many nice comments and messages that I wanted to post an update to say i m still alive  i m doing better  and thank you all so much  My mom found me when she got home from work and took me to the hospital where I spent about a week  but things have been pretty good since I got out  One of my friends flew out to see me and we just got back from camping and I had so much fun  and I know where I want to go to school and what to study next year  For the first time in months i m feeling hopeful and excited for the future and I thought I should share it with all of you  Thank you
summary: It's my birthday today. I got sick and spent a week in hospital, but I'm doing better now. I just got back from camping and I know where I want to go to school and what to study next year. For the first time in months I feel hopeful and excited about the future.
